key_points: Marine Capt. Evan Campbell escorted Lady Gaga at President Biden's inauguration, aiding her due to concerns about her large dress.
Campbell was chosen to assist Gaga because of his stature and was happy to help.
He kept his role as Gaga's escort a secret until the event to avoid any potential embarrassment.
Campbell and Gaga shared a laugh before their public appearance, bonding over the possibility of tripping.
Gaga was nervous and prayed with Campbell backstage, seeking reassurance.
Campbell felt a deep resonance with Gaga's dedication to her performance, aligning it with his oath as a service member.
Gaga told Campbell the inauguration was the most important day of her life, highlighting its significance to her.
Campbell felt proud to represent the Marines, especially after receiving positive attention online.
Gaga described performing at the inauguration as the honor of her lifetime, highlighting the symbolic importance of the event.
The performance was part of the "America United"-themed inauguration ceremony, encapsulating hopes for national unity and peace.
spokespersons: Marine Capt. Evan Campbell (Assisting Lady Gaga)
